qualitative.reasoning: Supreme Industries is led by the Taparia Group, known for high corporate governance standards and consistent dividend payouts (approx. 40-50%). The company is the largest plastic piping manufacturer in India with a 14% market share and a strong, debt-free balance sheet. Management has provided optimistic volume growth guidance of 14-15% for FY26 and is on track with capacity expansions to 1 million MT by 2026.
